problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the rectangle ABCD, AB = N_0, AD = N_1, BE ⊥ AC, then the length of BE is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是矩形,∴∠ABC=90°,BC=AD=4,∴AC=√{AB²+BC²}=√{3²+4²}=5,∵BE⊥AC,∴△ABC的面积=\frac{1}{2}AC•BE=\frac{1}{2}AB•BC,∴BE=\frac{AB×BC}{AC}=\frac{3×4}{5}=\frac{12}{5}；故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了矩形的性质、勾股定理、三角形面积的计算方法；熟练掌握矩形的性质,由三角形的面积求出BE是解决问题的关键．
